name: bj-biexal1
params: setvar s0, wff w0, wff w1
body: |- wb(wal(s0, wi(w0, wal(s0, w1))), wi(wex(s0, w0), wal(s0, w1)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wal(s0, wi(w0, wal(s0, w1))), wi(wex(s0, w0), wal(s0, w1)))
-| wnf(s0, wal(s0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wal(s0, wi(w0, wal(s0, w1))), wi(wex(s0, w0), wal(s0, w1)))
-| wnf(s0, wal(s0, w1))
|- wb(wal(s0, wi(w0, wal(s0, w1))), wi(wex(s0, w0), wal(s0, w1)))

comment: A general FOL biconditional that generalizes ~ 19.9ht among others. For this and the following theorems, see also ~ 19.35 , ~ 19.21 , ~ 19.23 . (Contributed by BJ, 20-Oct-2019.)
